data.eml:eml: New species of Neotropical Melanagromyza Hendel (Diptera: Agromyzidae) from Asteraceae flower heads

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Braun, Marina Reiter, Prado, Angelo Pires Do, Lewinsohn, Thomas Michael (2009): New species of Neotropical Melanagromyza Hendel (Diptera: Agromyzidae) from Asteraceae flower heads. Zootaxa 2279: 51-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275266
